name: 透の母
text: 今日ね、同窓会だから私ー
trans: I've got a class reunion today, see.

name: 透の母
text: お父さんも遅くなるって
trans: Your dad'll be home late, too.

name: 透の母
text:
ね、こっちのブラウスと水玉のだったら
やっぱりこっちだと思う！？
trans: Here, between this blouse and the polka-dot one. I should go for this one, right!?

name: 透の母
text:
えー！　迷っちゃうなぁ……
あ、透の青いワンピース借りようかな？
trans:
Whaaat! I'm lost in the woods here...
Ah. Maybe if I borrow your blue one-piece quickly?

name: 透
text:
──お母さんのじゃん
もともと……
trans:
──Wasn't it yours anyway?
In the first place...

name: 小糸
text:
……着目する角度90°－Θを
左下にもってきて……
trans:
...bring that 90° - Θ angle
down to the lower left...

name: 店員
text:
こちらのお色、新色なんですー
いい色じゃないですかー？
trans:
This is a new color we have in!
Don't you think it's lovely?

name: 店員
text:
お客様ですと、きっとこちらのお色味なんかも
似合うんじゃないかなーって思うんですけどー
trans: Ma'am, I think the shade this one comes in would fit you quite well──just my opinion.

name: 透
text:
ネカフェ
行くかー……
trans: Maybe I'll go to a net cafe...

name: 透
text:
待て待て……
ないよ、エサとか
trans:
Hold up, hold up...
I don't have any. Treats or whatever.

name: 透
trans:
Quit it, I'm telling you.
C'mon────

name: 女性の声
text:
マロンちゃーん……！
────あっ、マロンちゃん……！

name: 女性
text:
もう、勝手に走ってっちゃダメ……！
──ごめんなさいねぇ、ご迷惑かけたかしら？
trans:
Here, you can't just run off by yourself...!
──I'm so sorry about that. Did my dog bother you at all?

name: 女性
text:
よかった……！　それじゃあ失礼しますね
──マロンちゃん行くわよー
trans:
That's good...! Well, then, excuse us please.
──Come on, Marron-chan, we're off now.
